methodologies.note: Students will discuss weekly assigned readings in class.
Students will be able to apply qualitative tools in a context of their choice.

grading.note: Students will be expect to read and discuss weekly topics.

Project(50%):  In this class, you will go through several procedures in conducting a qualitative study.  By completing each step, you will begin to get a sense of how to conduct a qualitative study.  However, due to time constraint, you will not be able to develop a full research study.  
1.	Entering the field:  You will select a site for your project
2.	Writing a research problem:  Based on some preliminary reading of articles in your chosen area, develop a need to study your problem and frame your problem.
3.	Design your data collection method and execute your methods
4.	Analyze your data 
5.	Report on your data

Synthesis:  Each student will be required to select a qualitative study and analyze the study based on the issues we have discussed in class.  Students will be expected to report their analysis of the article to the class.

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
